name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Head Size: Between 4.5 - 5.5" (from chin to about 0.5" above the eyebrows)
Lightweight & Breathable Design : Reduces bulk while maximizing airflow for all-game comfort
Adjustable Padding & Chin Cup : Customizable fit for secure protection and comfort
Exceptional Visibility : Wider field of view and glasses-compatible design for clear sightlines
Ponytail-Friendly Fit : Designed to comfortably accommodate ponytails, braids, and full hair
Detachable Padding : Easy-to-remove pads make cleaning and maintenance simple
